metadata.title: CVE-2012-2353 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Moodle 2.1.x before 2.1.6 and 2.2.x before 2.2.3 allows remoteauthenticated users to obtain sensitive user information from hidden fieldsby leveraging the teacher role and navigating to "Enrolled users" under theUsers Settings section.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2353` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
